messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Unschooling Live-in Nanny?
messages.msgSnippet: ... this morning. Yes.  It just came through a couple of hours ago.  Was there more than the one post from him?  I only saw one. ... rereading Pam s message
messages.messageBody:
>
> He just unsubbed within the past few hours because I saw his name there
this morning.

Yes. It just came through a couple of hours ago. Was there more than the
one post from him? I only saw one.

>Pam and I have been discussing him and what his motives may be. I was just
rereading Pam's message when your post came through >and I don't see
anything in it that would scare him off, but who knows?

*If* he really is just a somewhat naive university student, I don't see why
Pam's post would scare him off. And that *is* what I thought when I read
his post. *If* he is something other than what he suggested, I can see
perfectly well why Pam's post would scare him off.
Tia
leschke@...

"Do not go where the path may lead, go instead where
there is no path and leave a trail."
- Ralph Waldo Emerson

messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Unschooling Live-in Nanny?
messages.msgSnippet: Tia, He just unsubbed within the past few hours because I saw his name there this morning.  Pam and I have been discussing him and what his motives may be.  I
messages.messageBody:
Tia,

He just unsubbed within the past few hours because I saw his name there this morning. Pam and I have been discussing him and what his motives may be. I was just rereading Pam's message when your post came through and I don't see anything in it that would scare him off, but who knows? I did notice that he didn't have a Yahoo ID. A lot of people have no profile, but they have IDs. Anyway, if you View Source you can see where someone's computer is. People can be easily traced.

Crystal
----- Original Message -----
From: Tia Leschke
To: UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Saturday, September 20, 2003 2:49 PM
Subject: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Unschooling Live-in Nanny?


I was quite willing to believe that Blake really was just a bit naive about
the realities of the internet and parenting, but the fact that he unsubbed
soon after Pam's gentle warning makes me wonder.
Tia
leschke@...

"Do not go where the path may lead, go instead where
there is no path and leave a trail."
- Ralph Waldo Emerson
